data.title: New Prince album release date
data.meta_description: Release info about new and forthcoming Prince album and singles.
data.text:
Home / New Releases

New Prince album

Trawling the web for release info and all the latest on forthcoming Prince albums, music and DVDs? You found the right place. Details of new Prince releases are posted here as soon as known, with full information also given in the newsroom. Releases apply to the US and UK as elsewhere tends to follow these dates. Explore below for individual track listings, background and release details.

Prince’s past albums are undergoing reissue by Sony Legacy since the publishing rights to his post Warner catalogue has been licensed to Sony Music Entertainment via their imprint label Legacy Recordings. Since the start of 2021, excepting the four soundtrack albums (Purple Rain, Parade, Batman and Graffiti Bridge), Prince’s entire catalogue has passed to Sony in the US. Elsewhere will still be covered by Warner Records. It makes a fiendishly complex and possibly unique set up. But as long as the releases come, let’s assume the process works. So do check back often. See also the dedicated page listing every posthumous Prince reissue and release since his death in April 2016.

New Prince releases in 2024

Purple Rain [40th Anniversary Edition]

Warner Bros Pictures

OUT NOW

4K UHD

Prince’s iconic movie Purple Rain receives the UHD treatment in celebration of its 40th Anniversary. Its soundtrack became one of the highest selling albums of all time and was Prince’s most successful. Upgraded to 4K for the first time, the movie the double disc Steelbook packages both regular Blu-ray and 4K UHD versions and is available from 29 July. Single disc UHD version is available from 24 July.

BUY AT AMAZON

Purple Rain [40th Anniversary Edition] was released in 4K UHD format on 29 July 2024.

Silver Tongue

Sony Legacy

OUT NOW

Streaming

The third and final single honouring the 20th anniversary of Prince’s 2004 album Musicology, this 2004 full studio version of the track which was issued as a Demo as virtual B-side for the US promo single Call My Name. It’s been cleaned up and enhanced for 2024 and for the first time available on all streaming services.

Silver Tongue was released in Streaming format on 24 May 2024.

Magnificent

Sony Legacy

OUT NOW

Streaming

The second single marking the 20th anniversary of Prince’s 2004 album Musicology, this 2004 virtual B-side Magnificent is cleaned up and enhanced fit for 2024 and for the first time available on all streaming services.

Magnificent was released in Streaming format on 26 April 2024.

United States Of Division

Sony Legacy

OUT NOW

Streaming

Dropped to mark the 20th anniversary of Prince’s twenty-eighth studio album Musicology, the hard to obtain 2004 virtual B-side United States Of Division is cleaned up and enhanced fit for 2024 and now available on all popular streaming services.

United States Of Division was released in Streaming format on 5 April 2024.
